ThingDef.Name: MeleeWeapon_CW_STB_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona C-85S shock baton
ThingDef.description: A combat knife with a blade with special properties. The blade has a high penetrating power.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: MeleeWeapon_CW_CK_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona C-6 fighting knife
ThingDef.description: A combat knife with a blade with special properties. The blade has a high penetrating power.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: MeleeWeapon_CW_BLD_Bond

ThingDef.description: A combat blade with a blade with special properties. The blade has a high penetrating power.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_CW_45CPS_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona C-48S shock pistol
ThingDef.description: It is a pistol with mediocre performance, but the characteristics of the charged bullet provide high penetration.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_multipleATrocket_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona CRR-66 multiple rocket launcher
ThingDef.description: A disposable quad-barrel rocket launcher with extremely high armor penetration.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CW_CR8ChargeLMG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona C9-L charge LMG
ThingDef.description: Machine gun suitable for medium to long range leading.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CW_CR8ChargeGPMG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona C9-H charge GPMG
ThingDef.description: This machine gun boasts a high hit rate at long range and is more suitable for long range than the C9-L.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CW_CR8ChargeSMG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona C-10 charge SMG
ThingDef.description: SMGs that are powerful at close range\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CW_CR8ChargePDW_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona C-11 bullpup SMG
ThingDef.description: A bullpup-ized SMG with an extended range thanks to the barrel length.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CW_CR8ChargePDWS_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona C-11K charge PDW
ThingDef.description: This model is a further shortened version of the bullpup-ized SMG. It greatly improves rapid-fire performance at the expense of range and accuracy.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CW_CR8ChargeSG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona C-20 charge riot gun
ThingDef.description: A shotgun that fires bullets with a striking attribute. Its properties can stun an opponent.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CW_CR8ChargeSGA_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona C-21 charge frechette gun
ThingDef.description: A shotgun that fires a large number of fine, penetrating bullets. Its nature allows it to inflict wounds in multiple locations with a single attack.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_CW_45CP_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona C-48 charge pistol
ThingDef.description: It is a pistol with mediocre performance, but the characteristics of the charged bullet provide high penetration.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CW_CR8ChargeRifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona C-8L charge rifle
ThingDef.description: Compared to the standard charge rifle, it is inferior in damage and penetration, but superior in range and accuracy.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CW_CR8ChargeDMR_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona C-8H charge DMR
ThingDef.description: C-8H charge rifle modified for sniper use. It is superior in power, range, and accuracy, but inferior in rapid-fire power.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CW_CR8ChargeRifleGL_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona C-8L charge rifle GL
ThingDef.description: C-8L charge rifle with grenade launcher attached. Due to its weight, the grenade launcher has poor rapid-firing power.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CW_CRH8ChargeRifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona C-8H charge rifle
ThingDef.description: C-8L Charging Rifle A rifle that fires larger caliber rounds. It has superior damage, penetrating power, and effective range, but its rapid-firing performance is inferior.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CW_CR8HChargeRifleGL_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona C-8H charge rifle GL
ThingDef.description: C-8H charge rifle with grenade launcher. The rapid-fire performance has been sacrificed.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_CW_24SR_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona C-8A charge AMR
ThingDef.description: boasts very strong penetration, attack power, and range, but is greatly inferior in rapid fire.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CW_CR8CChargeRifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona C-8K charge carbine
ThingDef.description: This model is a carbine version of the C-8L charge rifle. It excels in close-range combat power.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CW_CR8SFChargeRifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona C-8SK charge carbine
ThingDef.description: Customized C-8K. It has improved accuracy and range with a slight sacrifice of rapid fire.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: CW_CR8SFChargeRifleSG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona C-8SK charge carbine SG
ThingDef.description: C-8SK charge carbine with shotgun. Its weight sacrifices rapid-firing capability.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.
